doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Tapan Kumar Saha
doctor.specialty: Psychiatry (Mental Diseases, Brain Disorder, Drug Addiction) Specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Tapan Kumar Saha is a Psychiatrist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Psychiatry). He is a Professor, Psychiatry at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Tapan Kumar Saha at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 1:30pm to 3pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: 955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, Barisal
